cause.description:
The Autistics and Allies Association is to promote the autism acceptance and rights movement by both autistics and their allies and to promote the education about autism.
Motto: Support, Love, and Acceptance.
This cause is created by a high fuctioning autistic.
1. To promote the autism acceptance and rights movement with the use of both autistics and allies.
2. To promote the education of autism to dismiss the myths about autism, show the realities of autism, and promote the autistic culture.
3. To promote that autism does not need a cure, but rather support, love, and acceptance.
cause.mission: The purpose of the Autistics and Allies Association is to promote the autism acceptance and rights movement by both autistics and their allies and to promote the education about autism.
cause.name: The Autistics and Allies Association
